name: Saphire - A New Gen Story
description:
Saphire , an ambitious girl and her friend Ruby go to a cliche ghosty house to cure a cliche ghost who lost his wife and is depressed by it. This clich-ing will stop , once they start to uncover together the mysteries of  his house. 

Third Year of keeping the tradition up.

If you never heard of something called "New Gen" perhaps you won't like this game as much as the ones who did live through a particular journey , but of course you can play it,

This game is a puzzle game , that contains a story , i am happy that i did it , and managed to finish it , and it seems polished enough. 

In any case , this one is way smaller then the ones i made before , BUT , unlike the others , this one is a click and point , story puzzle game soooo progress , progress..

middle ps (IK THOSE DON'T EXIST BUT THEY DO IN MY DESCRIPTION) : anyway , use doors to go into an area or another , or if there is not any door , click the corner of your screens on the left to go back ,  the only exception would be the first pic , where you have to click somewhere near the house , not on it. And in the third pic where you click the stairs. 

back to the description :  

I felt like i wanted to do something and i did . I think the puzzle is pretty hard but hey maybe i am wrong , i left lots of hints . 

Just FYI , the game is click and point , which means you gotta click many different things to get new knowledge about the story/puzzle. 

I also left one small easter egg for the  ones who know me personally , well , probably more then one. 

I certainly added the torture device that is "aha" 

Alongside other things obviously. 

Finally , give it a try maybe , this game is in no shape or form designed to be top level puzzle game , but still , it's something that i am proud of.  Oh and i might , just MIGHT do a small video where i explain how to uncover the puzzle , if i will I'll put the link here. Unless laziness gets the better of me.  if i don't and the puzzle is overly hard , text me on Discord if you want , here's my tag :  Knightwatcher#3889
